short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NPO Start Dual Subtitles for language learning

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description
Elevate your experience on NPO Start by translating subtitles into English in real time! Whether you’re watching live channels, movies, or shows, this extension makes subtitles more accessible and easy to understand.

How it works:

Ensure subtitles are enabled and visible on the video.
Click the extension icon or press CTRL + B (or Command + B on Mac) to activate the subtitle translator.
Translated subtitles will appear alongside the original ones in real time.
Features:

Works across NPO Start’s live channels, movies, and shows.
Quick and easy activation with a keyboard shortcut or a single click.
Automatically translates subtitles to English without disrupting your viewing experience.

Important Note:
This extension is designed specifically for use with NPO Start and translates subtitles into English only. Ensure subtitles are visible before activating the translator.
